valueProp:
Schwartz Perry & Heller LLP is a team of dedicated employment lawyers in New York City, advocating for employees who have been victims of discrimination and harassment in the workplace. With over 30 years of experience, they have a track record of groundbreaking results and substantial jury awards. The firm is committed to advancing the human rights of individuals targeted due to their age, gender, race, sexual orientation, and other illegal reasons.

The attorneys at Schwartz Perry & Heller LLP provide personalized and compassionate legal support to clients, offering unwavering commitment to fighting for their rights. They handle cases related to age discrimination, sexual harassment, pregnancy discrimination, race and color discrimination, religious discrimination, and more. The firm has been recognized for its high level of skill and experience in employment law, setting the standard in the field.
